CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that deleted databases do not get recreated.

Preparing database
Verifying that database was created
Loading values
Deleting database
Loading values again (which should fail)
IndexedDBAgent error: Aborted upgrade.
Verifying that database was not recreated
